sources.title: Custom prompts - OpenAI Codex
sources.evidence_snippet: Custom prompts are deprecated. Use skills for reusable instructions.

sources.title: AGENTS.md - OpenAI Codex
sources.evidence_snippet: AGENTS.md files are a way to provide custom instructions.

sources.title: Security and sandboxing - OpenAI Codex
sources.evidence_snippet: Run each task in a separate cloud sandbox.

sources.title: openai/codex README
sources.evidence_snippet: `~/.codex/config.toml` and sessions stored in `~/.codex/sessions/YYYY/MM/DD`.

sources.title: Manage memory with CLAUDE.md
sources.evidence_snippet: Use CLAUDE.md files to give Claude instructions.

sources.title: Settings - Claude Code
sources.evidence_snippet: Global settings file is `~/.claude/settings.json`.

sources.title: Slash commands and skills - Claude Code
sources.evidence_snippet: Extend Claude Code with custom slash commands and skills.

sources.title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) - Claude Code
sources.evidence_snippet: Connect Claude Code to hundreds of external tools through MCP.

sources.title: OpenCode homepage
sources.evidence_snippet: Open source AI coding agent built for the terminal.

sources.title: Providers - OpenCode docs
sources.evidence_snippet: Bring your own API keys from 75+ providers and local models.

sources.title: Agents - OpenCode docs
sources.evidence_snippet: OpenCode reads AGENTS.md files automatically.

sources.title: sst/opencode repository
sources.evidence_snippet: Repository license: MIT.

sources.title: Kimi Code CLI getting started
sources.evidence_snippet: Kimi Code is an AI coding assistant by Moonshot AI.

sources.title: Kimi Code CLI key features
sources.evidence_snippet: Highlights deep zsh integration, MCP support, and permission management.

sources.title: Kimi Code CLI interaction mode
sources.evidence_snippet: Shell mode shortcut is Ctrl+X; /yolo enables automatic execution.

sources.title: Kimi Code CLI session management
sources.evidence_snippet: Kimi automatically saves conversation history and context.

sources.title: GPT-5-Codex model card
sources.evidence_snippet: gpt-5-codex supports a 400,000 token context window.

sources.title: Models overview - Anthropic
sources.evidence_snippet: Claude Sonnet 3.5 lists a 200K context window.

sources.title: Codex CLI local help snapshot
sources.evidence_snippet: codex exec Run Codex non-interactively; --dangerously-bypass-approvals-and-sandbox; codex resume.

sources.title: Claude Code CLI local help snapshot
sources.evidence_snippet: --dangerously-skip-permissions; -c/--continue; -r/--resume; -p/--print.

sources.title: OpenCode CLI local help snapshot
sources.evidence_snippet: opencode run [message..]; -c/--continue; -s/--session; --fork; no yolo/danger skip flag listed.

sources.title: Kimi CLI local help snapshot
sources.evidence_snippet: --yolo auto-approves actions; --session/-S; --continue/-C; --print for non-interactive mode.

sources.title: Claude Code Hooks reference
sources.evidence_snippet: This page provides reference documentation for implementing hooks in Claude Code.

sources.title: OpenCode Commands docs
sources.evidence_snippet: Custom commands can be configured to execute JavaScript code. OpenCode also includes built-in commands like /init and /undo.

sources.title: OpenCode MCP servers docs
sources.evidence_snippet: MCP servers can be configured globally or by project and are exposed via opencode mcp commands.
